description.fr: {%ATTACK} Déclenche {#RAINBOW} si la cible a un {%ELEMENTARY_STATE}.
description.en: {%ATTACK} Triggers {#RAINBOW} if the target has an {%ELEMENTARY_STATE}.
description.es: {%ATTACK} Activa {#RAINBOW} si el objetivo tiene un {%ELEMENTARY_STATE}.
description.de: {%ATTACK} Löst {#RAINBOW} aus, wenn das Ziel einen\_{%ELEMENTARY_STATE} hat.
description.pt: {%ATTACK} Aciona {#RAINBOW} se o alvo tiver um {%ELEMENTARY_STATE}.

bgDescription.fr: Un brassard très confortable qui vous siéra en toutes circonstances, quelle que soit la situation.
bgDescription.en: This very comfortable armband will look perfect on you in any situation, whatever the situation.
bgDescription.es: Un brazalete de lo más cómodo que te combinará con cualquier cosa.
bgDescription.de: Eine äußerst komfortable Armbinde, die dir unter allen Umständen und ungeachtet der Situation stehen wird.
bgDescription.pt: Uma braçadeira tão confortável quanto versátil, ela cai como uma luva em qualquer situação.
